main event: A spherical object with a greenish hue and a red light was observed in the sky over Augusta, Maine on July 3, 1955.
interesting points: The object was approximately 3 to 16 miles long and had a green tail that became a vapor trail upon hitting the atmosphere.
A loud humming sound was noted during the sighting.
The object was observed visually from the ground and also detected on radar, with the radar occasionally losing track of it for a moment.
The object was reported to have illuminated the sky and traveled in a level flight from south to north at a very high altitude.
The sighting lasted for approximately 1 minute.
sighted object: one spherical object with a greenish hue and a red light
